I'm tak=
ing a wild guess but...
DAYOFDRA.MOD is probably a MODULE music file. Go to=
 http://www.modplug.com
and grab the modplug player. Open the dayofdra.mod =
in the player, and you
should start hearing music (if it IS a mod file)

Ba=
sically, MODs are "enhanced" midi files.. Custom intruments, and more
music=
al 'things' can be done. Also in existance are S3M, IT, and XM files
with m=
ore channels and more nifty features for composers..
